title: Cant update my game
body:
it was working fine just before the 9:30 update, now i keep getting this error when i go to the log in screen
http://prntscr.com/hdgiab

Then this happens
http://prntscr.com/hdghp2

replies.body: It looks like it's been a couple hours since you first posted this and you were able to play a game relatively recently. Were you still having problems patching at all?
That same thing is happening to me too
